MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G67 postcode area of Glasgow, it has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09:45am to safely carry out repairs to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:50am on Wednesday, 31 March 2021
